description: This file implements a simple authentication repository that manages user login state and credentials using Android's SharedPreferences. It provides methods for user registration, login, checking login status, retrieving the logged-in user's email, and logging out.

classes.name: AuthRepository
classes.description: A class that manages user authentication state using SharedPreferences, providing methods for registration, login, logout, and status checks.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user with email and password. Returns false if the user already exists, true otherwise.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Logs in a user with email and password. Returns true if credentials are correct, false otherwise.

methods.name: isLoggedIn
methods.description: Checks if a user is currently logged in.

methods.name: getLoggedInEmail
methods.description: Returns the email of the currently logged-in user.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Logs out the current user by clearing the stored login state.
